Idyllwild, Pine Cove, and Fern Valley are three unincorporated communities that are close to each other in the San Jacinto Mountains in Riverside County, California, United States. It is seen as a census-designated place (CDP). The CDP's population was 4,163 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in California Category:Settlements in Riverside County, California
title: Idyllwild–Pine Cove, California
